all_images.title: CHEZ REMI
all_images.description: Lebanese Caterer for all kinds of Lebanese cuisine varieties and in addition, she is a Canapés and Finger food specialist.
all_images.name: Al Khardawaty

all_images.title: Umai
all_images.description: Umai is a movement towards food appreciation. Gourmet Catering for all types of events, Umai offers finger food, buffet fine dining, live stations, and dessert bars.
all_images.name: Al Khardawaty

all_images.title: DIVA CATERING
all_images.description: DIVA is a full catering service and event planning company dedicated to providing you with exquisite cuisines and fantastic customer service.We offer a variety of menus and design options for everything from high tea, canapé buffet to full-on set menus, open buffets, and live stations.DIVA gives its customers a simple delivery solution at budget-friendly pricing. We will be happy to assist you at any time with placing food and beverage orders
all_images.name: Al Khardawaty

all_images.title: BARON EMPAIN PALACE
all_images.description: The Baron Empain Palace, better known as Le Palais Hindu or The Baron Palace is a distinctive and historic Indian-inspired mansion in Heliopolis, Cairo, Egypt.This is where you can have an extraordinary wedding in the palace's garden that can welcome up to 500 guests.
all_images.name: Al Khardawaty

all_images.title: PRINCE MUHAMMAD ALI PALACE
all_images.description: Prince Muhammad Ali Palace or better known as The Manial Palace and Museum is a former Alawiyya dynasty era palace and grounds on Rhoda Island on the Nile located in El-Manial district. The palace was built in 1901 as a rest area for the prince and because of its architectural style inspired by different eras like the Fatimid, Mamluk, Ottoman, Andalusian, Persian, and Shami, it was converted in 2015 into a public museum.The golden hall and the palace's garden is where you can have your royal wedding with up to 300 guests.
all_images.name: Al Khardawaty

all_images.title: heave7n
all_images.description: More than 10 years experience.Wedding planning, Interior design, Gardens and balcony design, Decorations, Flowers.We are passionate about awesome venues and amazing events! all_images.name: Al Khardawaty
